title: Ranging hood

properties.name: description
properties.value: The ranging hood is the skillcape hood associated with having achieved skill mastery in the Ranged skill. Players may buy the hood alongside the ranging cape from the Armour salesman at the Ranging Guild for 99,000 coins, provided that they have level 99 Ranged. The hood itself provides absolutely no offensive or defensive bonuses and may be worn for purely aesthetic purposes.

Item ID9758

The ranging hood is the skillcape hood associated with having achieved skill mastery in the Ranged skill. Players may buy the hood alongside the ranging cape from the Armour salesman at the Ranging Guild for 99,000 coins, provided that they have level 99 Ranged. The hood itself provides absolutely no offensive or defensive bonuses and may be worn for purely aesthetic purposes.

While the hood is bought with the skillcape, it is not needed to perform the emote associated with it; the skillcape is the only essential item.

Should players lose the hood, they may reclaim it from the armour salesman for free.

This item can be stored in the cape rack of a costume room, as part of the Ranging cape set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

The '''ranging hood''' is the skillcape hood associated with having achieved [[skill mastery]] in the [[Ranged]] [[skills|skill]]. Players may buy the hood alongside the [[ranging cape]] from the [[Armour salesman]] at the [[Ranging Guild]] for 99,000 [[coins]], provided that they have level 99 Ranged. The hood itself provides absolutely no offensive or defensive bonuses and may be worn for purely aesthetic purposes.

While the hood is bought with the skillcape, it is not needed to perform the [[Skill Cape (emote)|emote]] associated with it; the skillcape is the only essential item.

Should players lose the hood, they may reclaim it from the armour salesman for free.
